description: The ORTHO_PAYMENT_PLAN table contains information about orthodontics charging plans.

columns.name: TREATMENT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the dental billing plan record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ORTHO_PMT_PLAN_NUM
columns.description: The orthodontic charging plan number.

columns.name: ORTHO_PAT_INS_LIAB
columns.description: The patient or insurance liability of the orthodontic charging plan.

columns.name: ORTHO_PATIENT_YN
columns.description:
Indicate whether this charging plan line is for the self-pay portion of  this charging plan.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: ORTHO_PAYOR_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the payor who is associated with the orthodontic charging plan. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EPM table.

columns.name: ORTHO_PAYOR_ID_PAYOR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the payor.

columns.name: ORTHO_LIABILITY
columns.description: The self-pay or insurance portion for this orthodontic charging plan line.

columns.name: ORTHO_DOWN_PAYMENT
columns.description: The amount of the initial charge for this charging plan line.

columns.name: ORTHO_TERM_LENGTH
columns.description: The frequency of payments for this orthodontic charging plan line measured in months.

columns.name: ORTHO_TOTAL_TERMS
columns.description: The number of payments included in this orthodontic charging plan line.

columns.name: ORTHO_TERMS_LEFT
columns.description: The number of payments left on this orthodontic charging plan line.

columns.name: ORTHO_TERM_PAY
columns.description: The amount of the payments for this orthodontic charging plan line.

columns.name: ORTHO_LAST_TERM_PAY
columns.description: The amount of the final payment for this orthodontic charging plan line.

columns.name: ORTHO_START_DATE
columns.description: The date this charging plan line starts.

columns.name: ORTHO_DATE_ESTAB_DT
columns.description: The date when this orthodontic charging plan line was created.

columns.name: ORTHO_ACTIVE_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether this charging plan line is active or not. Y indicates that this line is active. N or a null value indicates that this line is not active.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ORTHO_PATIENT_YN

columns.name: ORTHO_ENTRY_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user record who entered the orthodontic charging plan line. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EMP table.

columns.name: ORTHO_ENTRY_TIME
columns.description: The time when orthodontic charging plan line was entered in the system.

columns.name: ORTHO_DEL_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user record who removed the orthodontic charging plan line. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EMP table.

columns.name: ORTHO_DEL_DATE
columns.description: The date when orthodontic charging plan line was removed.

columns.name: ORTHO_DEL_TIME
columns.description: The time when orthodontic charging plan was removed.

columns.name: ORTHO_CHARGING_DATE
columns.description: The date when the charge was dropped for this payment plan.

columns.name: NUM_VISITS_LEFT
columns.description: The required number of visits which are left for this payment plan term.

columns.name: LST_CHG_DT
columns.description: The last charge dropping date. In order to meet the minimum number of visits, we need to count the number of visits from the last charge dropping date to the current charge dropping date.

columns.name: NUM_OF_VIS_REQ
columns.description: Number of visits required by payer for the charging plan period.

columns.name: ORTHO_INITIAL_CHG_DATE
columns.description: Date to be used for the initial charge on this current charging plan line.

columns.name: ORTHO_INITIAL_CHG_PROC_ID
columns.description: Procedure to be used for the initial charge on the current charging plan line.

columns.name: ORTHO_PERIODIC_CHG_PROC_ID
columns.description: Procedure to be used for the periodic charge on the current charging plan line.
